snippet: Los Angeles was jolted awake just before dawn on Monday by a shallow earthquake with a magnitude of 4.4 that jangled nerves in the West Coast but caused no major damage or casualties.
abstract: Los Angeles is jolted awake just before dawn by shallow earthquake with magnitude of 4.4, fraying nerves but causing no major damage or casualties.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles was jolted awake just before dawn on Monday by a shallow earthquake with a magnitude of 4.4 that jangled nerves in the West Coast but caused no major damage or casualties.

headline.main: California: Los Angeles Is Jolted by Early Morning Earthquake
headline.print_headline: California: Los Angeles Is Jolted by Early Morning Earthquake
